title: The housholders philosophie VVherein is perfectly and profitably described, the true oeconomia and forme of housekeeping. With a table added thereunto of all the notable thinges therein contained. First written in Italian by that excellent orator and poet Signior Torquato Tasso, and now translated by T.K. Whereunto is anexed a dairie booke for all good huswiues.
author: Tasso, Torquato, 1544-1595.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by I[ohn] C[harlewood] for Thomas Hacket, and are to be sold at his shop in Lomberd-streete, vnder the signe of the Popes head,
